name: VR - Virtual Work Simulator
description:
With this application you can easily experience the day of a supermarket employee!
Many adventure waits for you, prepare, its going to be really tough!

- Full Non-gyroscope support
- Realistic Vr Walk
- Cardboard and any VR headset compatible
- No need for joystick, only body control
- New levels in our updates.

Rate and review, if you like our application!
